channel.title: Icons in chatbox
channel.description:
Hello, i am trying to add crowns to chatbox and yell. they are already in my cache because i can do ;;crown (id) and they show. http://prntscr.com/yqsiu but like where i say "Hi" i want it to do that for donators with a donator crown etc.
i dont have a floatbuffer.java like the tutorial i read said it should go in, this is Rune-Evo 742 i am trying to change around and make better. thanks for your support!

item.title: Icons in chatbox
item.dc:creator: @H3lix H3lix
item.description:
@H3lix wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:2, topic:513286”]what ever the donator crown icon is the player rank

example:
<img=5> // donator
your player must be rights 5 for it to appear next to their name.[/quote]

But idk where this is, or where i can change it :S

Read full topic

item.title: Icons in chatbox
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

what ever the donator crown icon is the player rank

example:
<img=5> // donator
your player must be rights 5 for it to appear next to their name.
